module Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration

-- | You can use <tt>RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration</tt> to
--   customize recommendations across two attributes. You can choose to
--   view recommendations for instances within the same instance families
--   or across different instance families. You can also choose to view
--   your estimated savings that are associated with recommendations with
--   consideration of existing Savings Plans or RI benefits, or neither.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newRightsizingRecommendationConfiguration</a> smart
--   constructor.
data RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration
RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration' :: RecommendationTarget -> Bool -> RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration

-- | The option to see recommendations within the same instance family or
--   recommendations for instances across other families. The default value
--   is <tt>SAME_INSTANCE_FAMILY</tt>.
[$sel:recommendationTarget:RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration'] :: RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration -> RecommendationTarget

-- | The option to consider RI or Savings Plans discount benefits in your
--   savings calculation. The default value is <tt>TRUE</tt>.
[$sel:benefitsConsidered:RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration'] :: RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration -> Bool

-- | Create a value of <a>RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration</a> with
--   all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   
--   <a>$sel:recommendationTarget:RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration'</a>,
--   <a>rightsizingRecommendationConfiguration_recommendationTarget</a> -
--   The option to see recommendations within the same instance family or
--   recommendations for instances across other families. The default value
--   is <tt>SAME_INSTANCE_FAMILY</tt>.
--   
--   
--   <a>$sel:benefitsConsidered:RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration'</a>,
--   <a>rightsizingRecommendationConfiguration_benefitsConsidered</a> - The
--   option to consider RI or Savings Plans discount benefits in your
--   savings calculation. The default value is <tt>TRUE</tt>.
newRightsizingRecommendationConfiguration :: RecommendationTarget -> Bool -> RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration

-- | The option to see recommendations within the same instance family or
--   recommendations for instances across other families. The default value
--   is <tt>SAME_INSTANCE_FAMILY</tt>.
rightsizingRecommendationConfiguration_recommendationTarget :: Lens' RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration RecommendationTarget

-- | The option to consider RI or Savings Plans discount benefits in your
--   savings calculation. The default value is <tt>TRUE</tt>.
rightsizingRecommendationConfiguration_benefitsConsidered :: Lens' RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration Bool
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration.RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration.RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration.RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration.RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration.RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration.RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration.RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration.RightsizingRecommendationConfiguration


module Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.RightsizingRecommendationMetadata

-- | Metadata for this recommendation set.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newRightsizingRecommendationMetadata</a> smart
--   constructor.
data RightsizingRecommendationMetadata
RightsizingRecommendationMetadata' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe LookbackPeriodInDays -> RightsizingRecommendationMetadata

-- | The ID for this specific recommendation.
[$sel:recommendationId:RightsizingRecommendationMetadata'] :: RightsizingRecommendationMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The timestamp for when Amazon Web Services made this recommendation.
[$sel:generationTimestamp:RightsizingRecommendationMetadata'] :: RightsizingRecommendationMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | Additional metadata that might be applicable to the recommendation.
[$sel:additionalMetadata:RightsizingRecommendationMetadata'] :: RightsizingRecommendationMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The number of days of previous usage that Amazon Web Services
--   considers when making this recommendation.
[$sel:lookbackPeriodInDays:RightsizingRecommendationMetadata'] :: RightsizingRecommendationMetadata -> Maybe LookbackPeriodInDays

-- | Create a value of <a>RightsizingRecommendationMetadata</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:recommendationId:RightsizingRecommendationMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>rightsizingRecommendationMetadata_recommendationId</a> - The ID for
--   this specific recommendation.
--   
--   <a>$sel:generationTimestamp:RightsizingRecommendationMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>rightsizingRecommendationMetadata_generationTimestamp</a> - The
--   timestamp for when Amazon Web Services made this recommendation.
--   
--   <a>$sel:additionalMetadata:RightsizingRecommendationMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>rightsizingRecommendationMetadata_additionalMetadata</a> -
--   Additional metadata that might be applicable to the recommendation.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lookbackPeriodInDays:RightsizingRecommendationMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>rightsizingRecommendationMetadata_lookbackPeriodInDays</a> - The
--   number of days of previous usage that Amazon Web Services considers
--   when making this recommendation.
newRightsizingRecommendationMetadata :: RightsizingRecommendationMetadata

-- | The ID for this specific recommendation.
rightsizingRecommendationMetadata_recommendationId :: Lens' RightsizingRecommendationMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The timestamp for when Amazon Web Services made this recommendation.
rightsizingRecommendationMetadata_generationTimestamp :: Lens' RightsizingRecommendationMetadata (Maybe Text)

--   considers when making this recommendation.

module Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.RightsizingRecommendationSummary

-- | The summary of rightsizing recommendations
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newRightsizingRecommendationSummary</a> smart
--   constructor.
data RightsizingRecommendationSummary
RightsizingRecommendationSummary' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> RightsizingRecommendationSummary

-- | The savings percentage based on the recommended modifications. It's
--   relative to the total On-Demand costs that are associated with these
--   instances.
[$sel:savingsPercentage:RightsizingRecommendationSummary'] :: RightsizingRecommendationSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The currency code that Amazon Web Services used to calculate the
--   savings.
[$sel:savingsCurrencyCode:RightsizingRecommendationSummary'] :: RightsizingRecommendationSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The total number of instance recommendations.
[$sel:totalRecommendationCount:RightsizingRecommendationSummary'] :: RightsizingRecommendationSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The estimated total savings resulting from modifications, on a monthly
--   basis.
[$sel:estimatedTotalMonthlySavingsAmount:RightsizingRecommendationSummary'] :: RightsizingRecommendationSummary -> Maybe Text

--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:

--   savings percentage based on the recommended modifications. It's
--   relative to the total On-Demand costs that are associated with these
--   instances.
--   
--   <a>$sel:savingsCurrencyCode:RightsizingRecommendationSummary'</a>,
--   <a>rightsizingRecommendationSummary_savingsCurrencyCode</a> - The
--   currency code that Amazon Web Services used to calculate the savings.
--   
--   
--   <a>$sel:totalRecommendationCount:RightsizingRecommendationSummary'</a>,
--   <a>rightsizingRecommendationSummary_totalRecommendationCount</a> - The
--   total number of instance recommendations.
--   
--   
--   <a>$sel:estimatedTotalMonthlySavingsAmount:RightsizingRecommendationSummary'</a>,
--   <a>rightsizingRecommendationSummary_estimatedTotalMonthlySavingsAmount</a>
--   - The estimated total savings resulting from modifications, on a
--   monthly basis.
newRightsizingRecommendationSummary :: RightsizingRecommendationSummary

--   relative to the total On-Demand costs that are associated with these
--   instances.

module Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.RootCause

-- | The combination of Amazon Web Services service, linked account,
--   Region, and usage type where a cost anomaly is observed.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newRootCause</a> smart constructor.
data RootCause
RootCause' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> RootCause

-- | The Amazon Web Services service name that's associated with the cost
--   anomaly.
[$sel:service:RootCause'] :: RootCause -> Maybe Text

-- | The <tt>UsageType</tt> value that's associated with the cost anomaly.
[$sel:usageType:RootCause'] :: RootCause -> Maybe Text

-- | The member account value that's associated with the cost anomaly.
[$sel:linkedAccount:RootCause'] :: RootCause -> Maybe Text

-- | The Amazon Web Services Region that's associated with the cost
--   anomaly.
[$sel:region:RootCause'] :: RootCause -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>RootCause</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:service:RootCause'</a>, <a>rootCause_service</a> - The Amazon
--   Web Services service name that's associated with the cost anomaly.
--   
--   <a>$sel:usageType:RootCause'</a>, <a>rootCause_usageType</a> - The
--   <tt>UsageType</tt> value that's associated with the cost anomaly.
--   
--   <a>$sel:linkedAccount:RootCause'</a>, <a>rootCause_linkedAccount</a> -
--   The member account value that's associated with the cost anomaly.
--   
--   <a>$sel:region:RootCause'</a>, <a>rootCause_region</a> - The Amazon
--   Web Services Region that's associated with the cost anomaly.
newRootCause :: RootCause

-- | The Amazon Web Services service name that's associated with the cost
--   anomaly.
rootCause_service :: Lens' RootCause (Maybe Text)

-- | The <tt>UsageType</tt> value that's associated with the cost anomaly.
rootCause_usageType :: Lens' RootCause (Maybe Text)

-- | The member account value that's associated with the cost anomaly.
rootCause_linkedAccount :: Lens' RootCause (Maybe Text)

-- | The Amazon Web Services Region that's associated with the cost
--   anomaly.
rootCause_region :: Lens' RootCause (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.RootCause.RootCause
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.RootCause.RootCause
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.RootCause.RootCause
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.RootCause.RootCause
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.RootCause.RootCause
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.RootCause.RootCause
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.RootCause.RootCause


module Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.Anomaly

-- | An unusual cost pattern. This consists of the detailed metadata and
--   the current status of the anomaly object.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAnomaly</a> smart constructor.
data Anomaly
Anomaly' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe [RootCause] -> Maybe Text -> Maybe AnomalyFeedbackType -> Text -> AnomalyScore -> Impact -> Text -> Anomaly

-- | The first day the anomaly is detected.
[$sel:anomalyStartDate:Anomaly'] :: Anomaly -> Maybe Text

-- | The dimension for the anomaly (for example, an Amazon Web Services
--   service in a service monitor).
[$sel:dimensionValue:Anomaly'] :: Anomaly -> Maybe Text

-- | The list of identified root causes for the anomaly.
[$sel:rootCauses:Anomaly'] :: Anomaly -> Maybe [RootCause]

-- | The last day the anomaly is detected.
[$sel:anomalyEndDate:Anomaly'] :: Anomaly -> Maybe Text

-- | The feedback value.
[$sel:feedback:Anomaly'] :: Anomaly -> Maybe AnomalyFeedbackType

-- | The unique identifier for the anomaly.
[$sel:anomalyId:Anomaly'] :: Anomaly -> Text

-- | The latest and maximum score for the anomaly.
[$sel:anomalyScore:Anomaly'] :: Anomaly -> AnomalyScore

-- | The dollar impact for the anomaly.
[$sel:impact:Anomaly'] :: Anomaly -> Impact

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the cost monitor that generated
--   this anomaly.
[$sel:monitorArn:Anomaly'] :: Anomaly -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Anomaly</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:anomalyStartDate:Anomaly'</a>, <a>anomaly_anomalyStartDate</a>
--   - The first day the anomaly is detected.
--   
--   <a>$sel:dimensionValue:Anomaly'</a>, <a>anomaly_dimensionValue</a> -
--   The dimension for the anomaly (for example, an Amazon Web Services
--   service in a service monitor).
--   
--   <a>$sel:rootCauses:Anomaly'</a>, <a>anomaly_rootCauses</a> - The list
--   of identified root causes for the anomaly.
--   
--   <a>$sel:anomalyEndDate:Anomaly'</a>, <a>anomaly_anomalyEndDate</a> -
--   The last day the anomaly is detected.
--   
--   <a>$sel:feedback:Anomaly'</a>, <a>anomaly_feedback</a> - The feedback
--   value.
--   
--   <a>$sel:anomalyId:Anomaly'</a>, <a>anomaly_anomalyId</a> - The unique
--   identifier for the anomaly.
--   
--   <a>$sel:anomalyScore:Anomaly'</a>, <a>anomaly_anomalyScore</a> - The
--   latest and maximum score for the anomaly.
--   
--   <a>$sel:impact:Anomaly'</a>, <a>anomaly_impact</a> - The dollar impact
--   for the anomaly.
--   
--   <a>$sel:monitorArn:Anomaly'</a>, <a>anomaly_monitorArn</a> - The
--   Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the cost monitor that generated this
--   anomaly.
newAnomaly :: Text -> AnomalyScore -> Impact -> Text -> Anomaly

-- | The first day the anomaly is detected.
anomaly_anomalyStartDate :: Lens' Anomaly (Maybe Text)

-- | The dimension for the anomaly (for example, an Amazon Web Services
--   service in a service monitor).
anomaly_dimensionValue :: Lens' Anomaly (Maybe Text)

-- | The list of identified root causes for the anomaly.
anomaly_rootCauses :: Lens' Anomaly (Maybe [RootCause])

-- | The last day the anomaly is detected.
anomaly_anomalyEndDate :: Lens' Anomaly (Maybe Text)

-- | The feedback value.
anomaly_feedback :: Lens' Anomaly (Maybe AnomalyFeedbackType)

-- | The unique identifier for the anomaly.
anomaly_anomalyId :: Lens' Anomaly Text

-- | The latest and maximum score for the anomaly.
anomaly_anomalyScore :: Lens' Anomaly AnomalyScore

-- | The dollar impact for the anomaly.
anomaly_impact :: Lens' Anomaly Impact

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the cost monitor that generated
--   this anomaly.
anomaly_monitorArn :: Lens' Anomaly Text
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.Anomaly.Anomaly
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.Anomaly.Anomaly
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.Anomaly.Anomaly
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.Anomaly.Anomaly
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.Anomaly.Anomaly
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.Anomaly.Anomaly
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.Anomaly.Anomaly

--   constructor.
data SavingsPlansAmortizedCommitment

--   purchased with an <tt>Upfront</tt> or <tt>PartialUpfront</tt> Savings
--   Plans.

--   regardless of your Savings Plans purchase method.

--   purchased with either a <tt>Partial</tt> or a <tt>NoUpfront</tt>.

--   The amortized amount of your Savings Plans commitment that was
--   purchased with an <tt>Upfront</tt> or <tt>PartialUpfront</tt> Savings
--   Plans.
--   
--   <a>$sel:totalAmortizedCommitment:SavingsPlansAmortizedCommitment'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansAmortizedCommitment_totalAmortizedCommitment</a> - The
--   total amortized amount of your Savings Plans commitment, regardless of
--   your Savings Plans purchase method.
--   
--   
--   <a>$sel:amortizedRecurringCommitment:SavingsPlansAmortizedCommitment'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansAmortizedCommitment_amortizedRecurringCommitment</a> -
--   The amortized amount of your Savings Plans commitment that was
--   purchased with either a <tt>Partial</tt> or a <tt>NoUpfront</tt>.
newSavingsPlansAmortizedCommitment :: SavingsPlansAmortizedCommitment

--   Plans.

--   regardless of your Savings Plans purchase method.

--   Savings Plans.

--   by all of your eligible Savings Plans usage in an account (or set of
--   accounts).
[$sel:coveragePercentage:SavingsPlansCoverageData'] :: SavingsPlansCoverageData -> Maybe Text

-- | The total cost of your Amazon Web Services usage, regardless of your
--   purchase option.
[$sel:totalCost:SavingsPlansCoverageData'] :: SavingsPlansCoverageData -> Maybe Text

--   Web Services usage at the public On-Demand rate.
--

--   <a>savingsPlansCoverageData_spendCoveredBySavingsPlans</a> - The
--   amount of your Amazon Web Services usage that is covered by a Savings
--   Plans.
--   
--   <a>$sel:coveragePercentage:SavingsPlansCoverageData'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansCoverageData_coveragePercentage</a> - The percentage of
--   your existing Savings Plans covered usage, divided by all of your
--   eligible Savings Plans usage in an account (or set of accounts).

--   Amazon Web Services usage, regardless of your purchase option.

--   Savings Plans.

--   accounts).

module Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.SavingsPlansCoverage

-- | The amount of Savings Plans eligible usage that is covered by Savings
--   Plans. All calculations consider the On-Demand equivalent of your
--   Savings Plans usage.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newSavingsPlansCoverage</a> smart constructor.
data SavingsPlansCoverage
SavingsPlansCoverage' :: Maybe DateInterval -> Maybe SavingsPlansCoverageData -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> SavingsPlansCoverage
[$sel:timePeriod:SavingsPlansCoverage'] :: SavingsPlansCoverage -> Maybe DateInterval

-- | The amount of Savings Plans eligible usage that the Savings Plans
--   covered.
[$sel:coverage:SavingsPlansCoverage'] :: SavingsPlansCoverage -> Maybe SavingsPlansCoverageData

-- | The attribute that applies to a specific <tt>Dimension</tt>.
[$sel:attributes:SavingsPlansCoverage'] :: SavingsPlansCoverage -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | Create a value of <a>SavingsPlansCoverage</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:timePeriod:SavingsPlansCoverage'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansCoverage_timePeriod</a> - Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:coverage:SavingsPlansCoverage'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansCoverage_coverage</a> - The amount of Savings Plans
--   eligible usage that the Savings Plans covered.
--   
--   <a>$sel:attributes:SavingsPlansCoverage'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansCoverage_attributes</a> - The attribute that applies to
--   a specific <tt>Dimension</tt>.
newSavingsPlansCoverage :: SavingsPlansCoverage

-- | Undocumented member.
savingsPlansCoverage_timePeriod :: Lens' SavingsPlansCoverage (Maybe DateInterval)

-- | The amount of Savings Plans eligible usage that the Savings Plans
--   covered.
savingsPlansCoverage_coverage :: Lens' SavingsPlansCoverage (Maybe SavingsPlansCoverageData)

-- | The attribute that applies to a specific <tt>Dimension</tt>.
savingsPlansCoverage_attributes :: Lens' SavingsPlansCoverage (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

module Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.SavingsPlansDetails

-- | The attribute details on a specific Savings Plan.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newSavingsPlansDetails</a> smart constructor.
data SavingsPlansDetails
SavingsPlansDetails' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> SavingsPlansDetails

-- | A group of instance types that Savings Plans applies to.
[$sel:instanceFamily:SavingsPlansDetails'] :: SavingsPlansDetails -> Maybe Text

-- | The unique ID that's used to distinguish Savings Plans from one
--   another.
[$sel:offeringId:SavingsPlansDetails'] :: SavingsPlansDetails -> Maybe Text

-- | A collection of Amazon Web Services resources in a geographic area.
--   Each Amazon Web Services Region is isolated and independent of the
--   other Regions.
[$sel:region:SavingsPlansDetails'] :: SavingsPlansDetails -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>SavingsPlansDetails</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.

--   distinguish Savings Plans from one another.

--   <a>$sel:region:SavingsPlansDetails'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansDetails_region</a> - A collection of Amazon Web
--   Services resources in a geographic area. Each Amazon Web Services
--   Region is isolated and independent of the other Regions.
newSavingsPlansDetails :: SavingsPlansDetails

-- | The unique ID that's used to distinguish Savings Plans from one
--   another.

--   Each Amazon Web Services Region is isolated and independent of the

module Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail

-- | Details for your recommended Savings Plans.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newSavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail</a> smart
--   constructor.
data SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail
SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe SavingsPlansDetails -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail

-- | The currency code that Amazon Web Services used to generate the
--   recommendations and present potential savings.
[$sel:currencyCode:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail'] :: SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail -> Maybe Text

-- | The average value of hourly On-Demand spend over the lookback period
--   of the applicable usage type.
[$sel:currentAverageHourlyOnDemandSpend:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail'] :: SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail -> Maybe Text

-- | Details for your recommended Savings Plans.
[$sel:savingsPlansDetails:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail'] :: SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail -> Maybe SavingsPlansDetails

-- | The lowest value of hourly On-Demand spend over the lookback period of
--   the applicable usage type.
[$sel:currentMinimumHourlyOnDemandSpend:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail'] :: SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail -> Maybe Text

-- | The estimated return on investment that's based on the recommended
--   Savings Plans that you purchased. This is calculated as
--   <tt>estimatedSavingsAmount</tt>/ <tt>estimatedSPCost</tt>*100.
[$sel:estimatedROI:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail'] :: SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail -> Maybe Text

-- | The highest value of hourly On-Demand spend over the lookback period
--   of the applicable usage type.
[$sel:currentMaximumHourlyOnDemandSpend:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail'] :: SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail -> Maybe Text

-- | The estimated savings amount that's based on the recommended Savings
--   Plans over the length of the lookback period.
[$sel:estimatedSavingsAmount:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail'] :: SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail -> Maybe Text

-- | The <tt>AccountID</tt> the recommendation is generated for.
[$sel:accountId:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail'] :: SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail -> Maybe Text

-- | The estimated monthly savings amount based on the recommended Savings
--   Plans.
[$sel:estimatedMonthlySavingsAmount:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail'] :: SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail -> Maybe Text

-- | The remaining On-Demand cost estimated to not be covered by the
--   recommended Savings Plans, over the length of the lookback period.
[$sel:estimatedOnDemandCost:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail'] :: SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail -> Maybe Text

-- | The estimated On-Demand costs you would expect with no additional
--   commitment, based on your usage of the selected time period and the
--   Savings Plans you own.
[$sel:estimatedOnDemandCostWithCurrentCommitment:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail'] :: SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail -> Maybe Text

-- | The upfront cost of the recommended Savings Plans, based on the
--   selected payment option.
[$sel:upfrontCost:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail'] :: SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail -> Maybe Text

-- | The cost of the recommended Savings Plans over the length of the
--   lookback period.
[$sel:estimatedSPCost:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail'] :: SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail -> Maybe Text

-- | The estimated savings percentage relative to the total cost of
--   applicable On-Demand usage over the lookback period.
[$sel:estimatedSavingsPercentage:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail'] :: SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail -> Maybe Text

-- | The estimated utilization of the recommended Savings Plans.
[$sel:estimatedAverageUtilization:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail'] :: SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail -> Maybe Text

-- | The recommended hourly commitment level for the Savings Plans type and
--   the configuration that's based on the usage during the lookback
--   period.
[$sel:hourlyCommitmentToPurchase:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail'] :: SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationDetail</a> with
--   all optional fields omitted.
--

module Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary

-- | Summary metrics for your Savings Plans Purchase Recommendations.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newSavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary</a> smart
--   constructor.
data SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary
SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary

-- | The currency code that Amazon Web Services used to generate the
--   recommendations and present potential savings.
[$sel:currencyCode:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary'] :: SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The recommended Savings Plans cost on a daily (24 hourly) basis.
[$sel:dailyCommitmentToPurchase:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary'] :: SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The estimated total cost of the usage after purchasing the recommended
--   Savings Plans. This is a sum of the cost of Savings Plans during this
--   term, and the remaining On-Demand usage.
[$sel:estimatedTotalCost:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary'] :: SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The estimated return on investment that's based on the recommended
--   Savings Plans and estimated savings.
[$sel:estimatedROI:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary'] :: SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The estimated total savings over the lookback period, based on the
--   purchase of the recommended Savings Plans.
[$sel:estimatedSavingsAmount:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary'] :: SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The estimated monthly savings amount that's based on the recommended
--   Savings Plans purchase.
[$sel:estimatedMonthlySavingsAmount:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary'] :: SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The estimated On-Demand costs you would expect with no additional
--   commitment. It's based on your usage of the selected time period and
--   the Savings Plans you own.
[$sel:estimatedOnDemandCostWithCurrentCommitment:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary'] :: SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The estimated savings relative to the total cost of On-Demand usage,
--   over the lookback period. This is calculated as
--   <tt>estimatedSavingsAmount</tt>/ <tt>CurrentOnDemandSpend</tt>*100.
[$sel:estimatedSavingsPercentage:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary'] :: SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The aggregate number of Savings Plans recommendations that exist for
--   your account.
[$sel:totalRecommendationCount:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary'] :: SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The current total on demand spend of the applicable usage types over
--   the lookback period.
[$sel:currentOnDemandSpend:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary'] :: SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The recommended hourly commitment that's based on the recommendation
--   parameters.
[$sel:hourlyCommitmentToPurchase:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary'] :: SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary</a>
--   with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:currencyCode:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary_currencyCode</a> - The
--   currency code that Amazon Web Services used to generate the
--   recommendations and present potential savings.
--   
--   
--   <a>$sel:dailyCommitmentToPurchase:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary_dailyCommitmentToPurchase</a>
--   - The recommended Savings Plans cost on a daily (24 hourly) basis.
--   
--   
--   <a>$sel:estimatedTotalCost:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary_estimatedTotalCost</a> -
--   The estimated total cost of the usage after purchasing the recommended
--   Savings Plans. This is a sum of the cost of Savings Plans during this
--   term, and the remaining On-Demand usage.
--   
--   <a>$sel:estimatedROI:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary_estimatedROI</a> - The
--   estimated return on investment that's based on the recommended Savings
--   Plans and estimated savings.
--   
--   
--   <a>$sel:estimatedSavingsAmount:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary_estimatedSavingsAmount</a>
--   - The estimated total savings over the lookback period, based on the
--   purchase of the recommended Savings Plans.
--   
--   
--   <a>$sel:estimatedMonthlySavingsAmount:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary_estimatedMonthlySavingsAmount</a>
--   - The estimated monthly savings amount that's based on the recommended
--   Savings Plans purchase.
--   
--   
--   <a>$sel:estimatedOnDemandCostWithCurrentCommitment:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary_estimatedOnDemandCostWithCurrentCommitment</a>
--   - The estimated On-Demand costs you would expect with no additional
--   commitment. It's based on your usage of the selected time period and
--   the Savings Plans you own.
--   
--   
--   <a>$sel:estimatedSavingsPercentage:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary_estimatedSavingsPercentage</a>
--   - The estimated savings relative to the total cost of On-Demand usage,
--   over the lookback period. This is calculated as
--   <tt>estimatedSavingsAmount</tt>/ <tt>CurrentOnDemandSpend</tt>*100.
--   
--   
--   <a>$sel:totalRecommendationCount:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary_totalRecommendationCount</a>
--   - The aggregate number of Savings Plans recommendations that exist for
--   your account.
--   
--   
--   <a>$sel:currentOnDemandSpend:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary_currentOnDemandSpend</a>
--   - The current total on demand spend of the applicable usage types over
--   the lookback period.
--   
--   
--   <a>$sel:hourlyCommitmentToPurchase:SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary_hourlyCommitmentToPurchase</a>
--   - The recommended hourly commitment that's based on the recommendation
--   parameters.
newSavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary :: SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary

-- | The currency code that Amazon Web Services used to generate the
--   recommendations and present potential savings.
savingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary_currencyCode :: Lens' SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | The recommended Savings Plans cost on a daily (24 hourly) basis.
savingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary_dailyCommitmentToPurchase :: Lens' SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | The estimated total cost of the usage after purchasing the recommended
--   Savings Plans. This is a sum of the cost of Savings Plans during this
--   term, and the remaining On-Demand usage.
savingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary_estimatedTotalCost :: Lens' SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | The estimated return on investment that's based on the recommended
--   Savings Plans and estimated savings.
savingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary_estimatedROI :: Lens' SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | The estimated total savings over the lookback period, based on the
--   purchase of the recommended Savings Plans.
savingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary_estimatedSavingsAmount :: Lens' SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | The estimated monthly savings amount that's based on the recommended
--   Savings Plans purchase.
savingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary_estimatedMonthlySavingsAmount :: Lens' SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | The estimated On-Demand costs you would expect with no additional
--   commitment. It's based on your usage of the selected time period and
--   the Savings Plans you own.
savingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary_estimatedOnDemandCostWithCurrentCommitment :: Lens' SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | The estimated savings relative to the total cost of On-Demand usage,
--   over the lookback period. This is calculated as
--   <tt>estimatedSavingsAmount</tt>/ <tt>CurrentOnDemandSpend</tt>*100.
savingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary_estimatedSavingsPercentage :: Lens' SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | The aggregate number of Savings Plans recommendations that exist for
--   your account.
savingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary_totalRecommendationCount :: Lens' SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | The current total on demand spend of the applicable usage types over
--   the lookback period.
savingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary_currentOnDemandSpend :: Lens' SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | The recommended hourly commitment that's based on the recommendation
--   parameters.
savingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary_hourlyCommitmentToPurchase :: Lens' SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary.SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary.SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary.SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary.SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary.SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary.SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary.SavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationSummary


module Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.SavingsPlansSavings

-- | The amount of savings that you're accumulating, against the public
--   On-Demand rate of the usage accrued in an account.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newSavingsPlansSavings</a> smart constructor.
data SavingsPlansSavings
SavingsPlansSavings' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> SavingsPlansSavings

-- | The savings amount that you're accumulating for the usage that's
--   covered by a Savings Plans, when compared to the On-Demand equivalent
--   of the same usage.
[$sel:netSavings:SavingsPlansSavings'] :: SavingsPlansSavings -> Maybe Text

-- | How much the amount that the usage would have cost if it was accrued
--   at the On-Demand rate.
[$sel:onDemandCostEquivalent:SavingsPlansSavings'] :: SavingsPlansSavings -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>SavingsPlansSavings</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:netSavings:SavingsPlansSavings'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansSavings_netSavings</a> - The savings amount that you're
--   accumulating for the usage that's covered by a Savings Plans, when
--   compared to the On-Demand equivalent of the same usage.
--   
--   <a>$sel:onDemandCostEquivalent:SavingsPlansSavings'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansSavings_onDemandCostEquivalent</a> - How much the
--   amount that the usage would have cost if it was accrued at the
--   On-Demand rate.
newSavingsPlansSavings :: SavingsPlansSavings

-- | The savings amount that you're accumulating for the usage that's
--   covered by a Savings Plans, when compared to the On-Demand equivalent
--   of the same usage.
savingsPlansSavings_netSavings :: Lens' SavingsPlansSavings (Maybe Text)

-- | How much the amount that the usage would have cost if it was accrued
--   at the On-Demand rate.
savingsPlansSavings_onDemandCostEquivalent :: Lens' SavingsPlansSavings (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.SavingsPlansSavings.SavingsPlansSavings
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.SavingsPlansSavings.SavingsPlansSavings
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.SavingsPlansSavings.SavingsPlansSavings
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.SavingsPlansSavings.SavingsPlansSavings
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.SavingsPlansSavings.SavingsPlansSavings
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.SavingsPlansSavings.SavingsPlansSavings
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.SavingsPlansSavings.SavingsPlansSavings


module Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.SavingsPlansUtilization

-- | The measurement of how well you're using your existing Savings Plans.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newSavingsPlansUtilization</a> smart constructor.
data SavingsPlansUtilization
SavingsPlansUtilization' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> SavingsPlansUtilization

-- | The amount of your Savings Plans commitment that wasn't consumed from
--   Savings Plans eligible usage in a specific period.
[$sel:unusedCommitment:SavingsPlansUtilization'] :: SavingsPlansUtilization -> Maybe Text

-- | The amount of <tt>UsedCommitment</tt> divided by the
--   <tt>TotalCommitment</tt> for your Savings Plans.
[$sel:utilizationPercentage:SavingsPlansUtilization'] :: SavingsPlansUtilization -> Maybe Text

-- | The total amount of Savings Plans commitment that's been purchased in
--   an account (or set of accounts).
[$sel:totalCommitment:SavingsPlansUtilization'] :: SavingsPlansUtilization -> Maybe Text

-- | The amount of your Savings Plans commitment that was consumed from
--   Savings Plans eligible usage in a specific period.
[$sel:usedCommitment:SavingsPlansUtilization'] :: SavingsPlansUtilization -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>SavingsPlansUtilization</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:unusedCommitment:SavingsPlansUtilization'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansUtilization_unusedCommitment</a> - The amount of your
--   Savings Plans commitment that wasn't consumed from Savings Plans
--   eligible usage in a specific period.
--   
--   <a>$sel:utilizationPercentage:SavingsPlansUtilization'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansUtilization_utilizationPercentage</a> - The amount of
--   <tt>UsedCommitment</tt> divided by the <tt>TotalCommitment</tt> for
--   your Savings Plans.
--   
--   <a>$sel:totalCommitment:SavingsPlansUtilization'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansUtilization_totalCommitment</a> - The total amount of
--   Savings Plans commitment that's been purchased in an account (or set
--   of accounts).
--   
--   <a>$sel:usedCommitment:SavingsPlansUtilization'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansUtilization_usedCommitment</a> - The amount of your
--   Savings Plans commitment that was consumed from Savings Plans eligible
--   usage in a specific period.
newSavingsPlansUtilization :: SavingsPlansUtilization

-- | The amount of your Savings Plans commitment that wasn't consumed from
--   Savings Plans eligible usage in a specific period.
savingsPlansUtilization_unusedCommitment :: Lens' SavingsPlansUtilization (Maybe Text)

-- | The amount of <tt>UsedCommitment</tt> divided by the
--   <tt>TotalCommitment</tt> for your Savings Plans.
savingsPlansUtilization_utilizationPercentage :: Lens' SavingsPlansUtilization (Maybe Text)

-- | The total amount of Savings Plans commitment that's been purchased in
--   an account (or set of accounts).
savingsPlansUtilization_totalCommitment :: Lens' SavingsPlansUtilization (Maybe Text)

-- | The amount of your Savings Plans commitment that was consumed from
--   Savings Plans eligible usage in a specific period.
savingsPlansUtilization_usedCommitment :: Lens' SavingsPlansUtilization (Maybe Text)

instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.SavingsPlansUtilization.SavingsPlansUtilization

module Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.SavingsPlansUtilizationAggregates

-- | The aggregated utilization metrics for your Savings Plans usage.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newSavingsPlansUtilizationAggregates</a> smart
--   constructor.
data SavingsPlansUtilizationAggregates
SavingsPlansUtilizationAggregates' :: Maybe SavingsPlansAmortizedCommitment -> Maybe SavingsPlansSavings -> SavingsPlansUtilization -> SavingsPlansUtilizationAggregates

-- | The total amortized commitment for a Savings Plans. This includes the
--   sum of the upfront and recurring Savings Plans fees.
[$sel:amortizedCommitment:SavingsPlansUtilizationAggregates'] :: SavingsPlansUtilizationAggregates -> Maybe SavingsPlansAmortizedCommitment

-- | The amount saved by using existing Savings Plans. Savings returns both
--   net savings from Savings Plans, as well as the
--   <tt>onDemandCostEquivalent</tt> of the Savings Plans when considering
--   the utilization rate.
[$sel:savings:SavingsPlansUtilizationAggregates'] :: SavingsPlansUtilizationAggregates -> Maybe SavingsPlansSavings

-- | A ratio of your effectiveness of using existing Savings Plans to apply
--   to workloads that are Savings Plans eligible.
[$sel:utilization:SavingsPlansUtilizationAggregates'] :: SavingsPlansUtilizationAggregates -> SavingsPlansUtilization

-- | Create a value of <a>SavingsPlansUtilizationAggregates</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:amortizedCommitment:SavingsPlansUtilizationAggregates'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansUtilizationAggregates_amortizedCommitment</a> - The
--   total amortized commitment for a Savings Plans. This includes the sum
--   of the upfront and recurring Savings Plans fees.
--   
--   <a>$sel:savings:SavingsPlansUtilizationAggregates'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansUtilizationAggregates_savings</a> - The amount saved by
--   using existing Savings Plans. Savings returns both net savings from
--   Savings Plans, as well as the <tt>onDemandCostEquivalent</tt> of the
--   Savings Plans when considering the utilization rate.
--   
--   <a>$sel:utilization:SavingsPlansUtilizationAggregates'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansUtilizationAggregates_utilization</a> - A ratio of your
--   effectiveness of using existing Savings Plans to apply to workloads
--   that are Savings Plans eligible.
newSavingsPlansUtilizationAggregates :: SavingsPlansUtilization -> SavingsPlansUtilizationAggregates

-- | The total amortized commitment for a Savings Plans. This includes the
--   sum of the upfront and recurring Savings Plans fees.
savingsPlansUtilizationAggregates_amortizedCommitment :: Lens' SavingsPlansUtilizationAggregates (Maybe SavingsPlansAmortizedCommitment)

-- | The amount saved by using existing Savings Plans. Savings returns both
--   net savings from Savings Plans, as well as the
--   <tt>onDemandCostEquivalent</tt> of the Savings Plans when considering
--   the utilization rate.
savingsPlansUtilizationAggregates_savings :: Lens' SavingsPlansUtilizationAggregates (Maybe SavingsPlansSavings)

-- | A ratio of your effectiveness of using existing Savings Plans to apply
--   to workloads that are Savings Plans eligible.
savingsPlansUtilizationAggregates_utilization :: Lens' SavingsPlansUtilizationAggregates SavingsPlansUtilization
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.SavingsPlansUtilizationAggregates.SavingsPlansUtilizationAggregates
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.SavingsPlansUtilizationAggregates.SavingsPlansUtilizationAggregates

module Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.SavingsPlansUtilizationDetail

-- | A single daily or monthly Savings Plans utilization rate, and details
--   for your account. A management account in an organization have access
--   to member accounts. You can use <tt>GetDimensionValues</tt> to
--   determine the possible dimension values.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newSavingsPlansUtilizationDetail</a> smart constructor.
data SavingsPlansUtilizationDetail
SavingsPlansUtilizationDetail' :: Maybe SavingsPlansAmortizedCommitment -> Maybe SavingsPlansSavings -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Maybe SavingsPlansUtilization -> Maybe Text -> SavingsPlansUtilizationDetail

-- | The total amortized commitment for a Savings Plans. Includes the sum
--   of the upfront and recurring Savings Plans fees.
[$sel:amortizedCommitment:SavingsPlansUtilizationDetail'] :: SavingsPlansUtilizationDetail -> Maybe SavingsPlansAmortizedCommitment

-- | The amount saved by using existing Savings Plans. Savings returns both
--   net savings from savings plans as well as the
--   <tt>onDemandCostEquivalent</tt> of the Savings Plans when considering
--   the utilization rate.
[$sel:savings:SavingsPlansUtilizationDetail'] :: SavingsPlansUtilizationDetail -> Maybe SavingsPlansSavings

-- | The attribute that applies to a specific <tt>Dimension</tt>.
[$sel:attributes:SavingsPlansUtilizationDetail'] :: SavingsPlansUtilizationDetail -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | A ratio of your effectiveness of using existing Savings Plans to apply
--   to workloads that are Savings Plans eligible.
[$sel:utilization:SavingsPlansUtilizationDetail'] :: SavingsPlansUtilizationDetail -> Maybe SavingsPlansUtilization

-- | The unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for a particular Savings Plan.
[$sel:savingsPlanArn:SavingsPlansUtilizationDetail'] :: SavingsPlansUtilizationDetail -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>SavingsPlansUtilizationDetail</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:amortizedCommitment:SavingsPlansUtilizationDetail'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansUtilizationDetail_amortizedCommitment</a> - The total
--   amortized commitment for a Savings Plans. Includes the sum of the
--   upfront and recurring Savings Plans fees.
--   
--   <a>$sel:savings:SavingsPlansUtilizationDetail'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansUtilizationDetail_savings</a> - The amount saved by
--   using existing Savings Plans. Savings returns both net savings from
--   savings plans as well as the <tt>onDemandCostEquivalent</tt> of the
--   Savings Plans when considering the utilization rate.
--   
--   <a>$sel:attributes:SavingsPlansUtilizationDetail'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansUtilizationDetail_attributes</a> - The attribute that
--   applies to a specific <tt>Dimension</tt>.
--   
--   <a>$sel:utilization:SavingsPlansUtilizationDetail'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansUtilizationDetail_utilization</a> - A ratio of your
--   effectiveness of using existing Savings Plans to apply to workloads
--   that are Savings Plans eligible.
--   
--   <a>$sel:savingsPlanArn:SavingsPlansUtilizationDetail'</a>,
--   <a>savingsPlansUtilizationDetail_savingsPlanArn</a> - The unique
--   Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for a particular Savings Plan.
newSavingsPlansUtilizationDetail :: SavingsPlansUtilizationDetail

-- | The total amortized commitment for a Savings Plans. Includes the sum
--   of the upfront and recurring Savings Plans fees.
savingsPlansUtilizationDetail_amortizedCommitment :: Lens' SavingsPlansUtilizationDetail (Maybe SavingsPlansAmortizedCommitment)

-- | The amount saved by using existing Savings Plans. Savings returns both
--   net savings from savings plans as well as the
--   <tt>onDemandCostEquivalent</tt> of the Savings Plans when considering
--   the utilization rate.
savingsPlansUtilizationDetail_savings :: Lens' SavingsPlansUtilizationDetail (Maybe SavingsPlansSavings)

-- | The attribute that applies to a specific <tt>Dimension</tt>.
savingsPlansUtilizationDetail_attributes :: Lens' SavingsPlansUtilizationDetail (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | A ratio of your effectiveness of using existing Savings Plans to apply
--   to workloads that are Savings Plans eligible.
savingsPlansUtilizationDetail_utilization :: Lens' SavingsPlansUtilizationDetail (Maybe SavingsPlansUtilization)

-- | The unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for a particular Savings Plan.
savingsPlansUtilizationDetail_savingsPlanArn :: Lens' SavingsPlansUtilizationDetail (Maybe Text)

--   address or SNS Amazon Resource Name (ARN). This depends on the
--   <tt>Type</tt>.

--   notification delivery channel.

module Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.AnomalySubscription

-- | The association between a monitor, threshold, and list of subscribers
--   used to deliver notifications about anomalies detected by a monitor
--   that exceeds a threshold. The content consists of the detailed
--   metadata and the current status of the <tt>AnomalySubscription</tt>
--   object.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAnomalySubscription</a> smart constructor.
data AnomalySubscription
AnomalySubscription' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> [Text] -> [Subscriber] -> Double -> AnomalySubscriptionFrequency -> Text -> AnomalySubscription

-- | Your unique account identifier.
[$sel:accountId:AnomalySubscription'] :: AnomalySubscription -> Maybe Text

-- | The <tt>AnomalySubscription</tt> Amazon Resource Name (ARN).
[$sel:subscriptionArn:AnomalySubscription'] :: AnomalySubscription -> Maybe Text

-- | A list of cost anomaly monitors.
[$sel:monitorArnList:AnomalySubscription'] :: AnomalySubscription -> [Text]

-- | A list of subscribers to notify.
[$sel:subscribers:AnomalySubscription'] :: AnomalySubscription -> [Subscriber]

-- | The dollar value that triggers a notification if the threshold is
--   exceeded.
[$sel:threshold:AnomalySubscription'] :: AnomalySubscription -> Double

-- | The frequency that anomaly reports are sent over email.
[$sel:frequency:AnomalySubscription'] :: AnomalySubscription -> AnomalySubscriptionFrequency

-- | The name for the subscription.
[$sel:subscriptionName:AnomalySubscription'] :: AnomalySubscription -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>AnomalySubscription</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:accountId:AnomalySubscription'</a>,
--   <a>anomalySubscription_accountId</a> - Your unique account identifier.
--   
--   <a>$sel:subscriptionArn:AnomalySubscription'</a>,
--   <a>anomalySubscription_subscriptionArn</a> - The
--   <tt>AnomalySubscription</tt> Amazon Resource Name (ARN).
--   
--   <a>$sel:monitorArnList:AnomalySubscription'</a>,
--   <a>anomalySubscription_monitorArnList</a> - A list of cost anomaly
--   monitors.
--   
--   <a>$sel:subscribers:AnomalySubscription'</a>,
--   <a>anomalySubscription_subscribers</a> - A list of subscribers to
--   notify.
--   
--   <a>$sel:threshold:AnomalySubscription'</a>,
--   <a>anomalySubscription_threshold</a> - The dollar value that triggers
--   a notification if the threshold is exceeded.
--   
--   <a>$sel:frequency:AnomalySubscription'</a>,
--   <a>anomalySubscription_frequency</a> - The frequency that anomaly
--   reports are sent over email.
--   
--   <a>$sel:subscriptionName:AnomalySubscription'</a>,
--   <a>anomalySubscription_subscriptionName</a> - The name for the
--   subscription.
newAnomalySubscription :: Double -> AnomalySubscriptionFrequency -> Text -> AnomalySubscription

-- | Your unique account identifier.
anomalySubscription_accountId :: Lens' AnomalySubscription (Maybe Text)

-- | The <tt>AnomalySubscription</tt> Amazon Resource Name (ARN).
anomalySubscription_subscriptionArn :: Lens' AnomalySubscription (Maybe Text)

-- | A list of cost anomaly monitors.
anomalySubscription_monitorArnList :: Lens' AnomalySubscription [Text]

-- | A list of subscribers to notify.
anomalySubscription_subscribers :: Lens' AnomalySubscription [Subscriber]

-- | The dollar value that triggers a notification if the threshold is
--   exceeded.
anomalySubscription_threshold :: Lens' AnomalySubscription Double

-- | The frequency that anomaly reports are sent over email.
anomalySubscription_frequency :: Lens' AnomalySubscription AnomalySubscriptionFrequency

-- | The name for the subscription.
anomalySubscription_subscriptionName :: Lens' AnomalySubscription Text
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.AnomalySubscription.AnomalySubscription
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.AnomalySubscription.AnomalySubscription
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.AnomalySubscription.AnomalySubscription
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.AnomalySubscription.AnomalySubscription
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.AnomalySubscription.AnomalySubscription
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.AnomalySubscription.AnomalySubscription
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.AnomalySubscription.AnomalySubscription
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Amazonka.CostExplorer.Types.AnomalySubscription.AnomalySubscription
